name: Recipe Book
backend_requirements: 1. Recipe model: id, title (required), ingredients (text), instructions (text), prep_time, servings
2. CRUD endpoints: GET /api/recipes, GET /api/recipes/:id, POST, PUT, DELETE
3. Search recipes: ?query=text searches title and ingredients
frontend_requirements: 1. Recipe list showing title, prep time, servings
2. Click recipe to view full details (ingredients and instructions)
3. Add/edit recipe form with all fields

api_endpoints.description: List all recipes (supports ?query=text to search title and ingredients)
